channel.title: R on A Hugo website
channel.description: Recent content in R on A Hugo website

item.title: time series
item.description: library(tidyverse) library(mosaic) library(AER) library(dynlm) library(knitr) library(broom) data("USMacroSW",package="AER") 時系列データからデータフレイムに変換 df <- data.frame(zoo::coredata(USMacroSW),time=zoo::index(USMacroSW)) inspect(df) ## ## quantitative variables: ## name class min Q1 median Q3 ## 1 unemp numeric 3.40000 5.00000 5.70000 6.833333e+00 ## 2 cpi numeric 27.77667 35.86666 87.93333 1.430667e+02 ## 3 ffrate numeric 0.93000 3.48000 5.40000 7.760000e+00 ## 4 tbill numeric 0.83000 3.50000

item.title: ggformula
item.description: ggformula というパッケージがある. https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/ggformula/index.html ひとことでいうと, ggplot2 を lattice のように扱えるようにしたパッケージである. 詳しくは以下を参照. https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/ggformula/vignettes/ggformula.html 自分の備忘録のために記録

item.title: random variable
item.description: set.seed(2017) library(mosaic) library(knitr) コインを20回投げる. rflip(20) ## ## Flipping 20 coins [ Prob(Heads) = 0.5 ] ... ## ## H H T T H H T T T T H T T T T T T H H H ## ## Number of Heads: 8 [Proportion Heads: 0.4] そうした行為を1000回繰

item.title: Project-Star
item.description: SW本13章の再現を試みる. 以下のライブラリを導入する library(knitr) library(mosaic) library(AER) library(texreg) library(tidyverse) library(stargazer) またロバスト分散を何度も計算するため次の関数を作っておく. ## convenience function: HC1 covariances hc1 <- function(x)

item.title: figure
item.description: library library(tidyverse) library(knitr) library(broom) library(AER) library(mosaic) データを少し加工する. data("CASchools", package = "AER") CASchools <- CASchools %>% mutate(score=(math + read)/2, STR = students/teachers, HiEL = I(english>=10)) 図8.2 lm(score ~ income, data = CASchools) %>% plotModel() 図8.3 fm2 <- lm(score ~ income + I(income^2), data = CASchools) fn2 <- makeFun(fm2) plotFun(fn2, add=T, col=2) ## converting numerical color

item.title: iv
item.description: SW12章の表12.1を再現する. まず以下のライブラリを導入する library(knitr) library(mosaic) library(AER) library(texreg) library(tidyverse) library(broom) データ生成は以下のとおりである data("CigarettesSW", package = "AER") df <- CigarettesSW %>% mutate(tdiff=(taxs - tax)/cpi, rprice=price/cpi, rincome = income/population/cpi) df1995 <-

item.title: maschools
item.description: SW本9章の表9.2を再現する. まず以下のライブラリを導入する library(knitr) library(mosaic) library(AER) library(texreg) library(tidyverse) またロバスト分散を何度も計算するため次の関数を作っておく. ## convenience function: HC1 covariances

item.title: panel
item.description: library library(tidyverse) library(knitr) library(broom) library(AER) library(plm) library(texreg) library(mosaic) data data("Fatalities") df <- Fatalities %>% mutate(frate = 10000 * fatal/pop, vmiles = miles/1000, punish= factor(jail == "yes" | service == "yes", labels = c("no", "yes")), drinkagec=relevel( cut(drinkage, breaks =18:22, include.lowest = TRUE, right = FALSE), ref = 4)) head(df) %>% kable() state year spirits unemp income emppop beertax baptist mormon drinkage dry youngdrivers miles breath jail service fatal nfatal sfatal fatal1517 nfatal1517 fatal1820 nfatal1820 fatal2124 nfatal2124 afatal pop pop1517 pop1820 pop2124 milestot unempus emppopus gsp frate vmiles punish drinkagec al 1982 1.

item.title: mosaic
item.description: パッケージ mosaic がアップグレードされた. library(mosaic) model <- lm(length ~ width + sex, data = KidsFeet) l <- makeFun(model) l(width = 8.25, sex = "B") ## 1 ## 23.59689 gf_point(length ~ width, data = KidsFeet, color = ~ sex) %>% gf_fun(l(w, sex = "B") ~ w, color = ~"B") %>% gf_fun(l(w, sex = "G") ~ w, color

item.title: texreg
item.description: ライブラリ AER データ を用いる. library(AER) data("CASchools", package = "AER") データ加工したうえで幾つか選択する. library(tidyverse) library(knitr) df <- CASchools %>% mutate(stratio=students/teachers,score=(math+read)/2) %>% select(score,stratio,english,lunch,calworks) df %>% head() %>% kable() score stratio english lunch calworks 690.80 17.88991 0.000000 2.0408 0.5102 661.20 21.52466 4.583334 47.9167 15.4167 643.60 18.69723 30.000002 76.3226

item.title: texreg poly
item.description: 初期設定 library(tidyverse) library(mosaic) library(broom) library(knitr) Births78 %>% head(3) %>% kable() date births dayofyear wday 1978-01-01 7701 1 Sun 1978-01-02 7527 2 Mon 1978-01-03 8825 3 Tues bwplot(births ~ wday, data=Births78) bwplot(wday ~ births, data=Births78, pch = "|") mean(births ~ wday, data = Births78) ## Sun Mon Tues Wed Thurs Fri Sat ## 7950.943 9371.327 9708.808 9498.019 9483.635 9625.788 8309.327 cars.mod1 <- lm(dist ~ speed, data = cars)

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.
